name: Remington Ionic Conditioning Hair Setter, 20 Velvet Hair Rollers, 6 Large (1¼”), 10 Medium (1"), 4 Small (¾”), Blowout Style Hair Curlers
about_this_item: UNLEASH LONG-LASTING CURLS: Experience the power of our exclusive Thermal Wax Core with Remington's Roller Set. This cutting-edge technology retains high heat longer, ensuring your curls stay beautifully intact and voluminous.

SHINE BRIGHT WITH IONIC CONDITIONING: Say goodbye to frizz and hello to dazzling shine with Remington's Electric Hair Rollers. Ionic Conditioning on each roller creates a silky, frizz-free finish, enhancing the radiance of your curls.

VERSATILE CURLING MASTERY: Tailor your curls and create your perfect style with 20 velvety heated rollers in different sizes - 6 Pink Large for Longer Hair, 10 Purple Medium for Medium Hair, and 4 White Small for Short Hair.

EFFORTLESS CREASE-FREE HOLD: Achieve a flawless look with our Color-Coded J Clips and Hot Rollers. These specially designed clips ensure your curls are held securely with minimal creasing, so you look your best.

GLAM WITH CERAMIC ROLLERS: Simplify your curl-setting routine with Remington's Ceramic-Coated Electric Rollers. These rollers make achieving stunning results an absolute breeze, and the cool touch ends make the rollers comfortable to use.

title: Close to perfect rollers
content: I really like these rollers,perfect sizes for me. The only complaint I have,is that when they are hot,the end caps come off inside the heating element or in my fingers while rolling my hair. It is quite frustrating,but I still use them. I've thought of finding a heat resistant adhesive to glue them on for good. Wish they didn't do that.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024

content: Fantastic Hot Curlers They warm up Fast they are Easy-to-use and Work Extremely well Great Quality and Great Price

title: Rollers

I used all but 4 rollers on her head (2 years old, medium thickness, fine textured hair) for thicker density hair, you will probably want to order two.

Fabric is a bit thin on the roller so be careful not to let rollers get too hot or you will get burned.

title: Roll
content: My hair is thin and falls to a couple inches past my shoulders.  The Remington Hair Setter gives me long lasting curls and waves.  I wish the color coding at the ends of the pins would be more pronounced.  With so little color on the tips, it is sometimes hard to distinguish which pins go with which rollers.  No problems with the pins staying in place.  Just insert them diagonally across the roller.  As for the heat indicator, it is a waste of time.  I really cannot tell any color difference on that dot no matter how long the rollers are heated up.  What works best for me is to plug the unit it for 5-7 minutes; then leave the rollers in for 10-15 minutes.  The rollers are easy to use.  And the unit is compact and stores easily.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I had been wanting one of these awhile.  The last set I had was a steam set that one had to add a TBSP or 3 of water to the bottom tray.  (Back in the 1900's) This one seems to have liquid inside the rollers.  No steam but perhaps that's the "Ionic" stated in the title.  I don't remember the description at this time, only my experience with the product.  I knew it was ready because I had plugged it in and left it way longer than I needed to. The little dot on the roller had turned from a reddish color to a solid white.  The side of the rollers where hot to the touch. Hot enough I was a little concerned my hair might burn, so I unplugged the unit, and began curling my hair.  It cooled in my hair about 30 minutes, but left in for an hours because I could.  Was concerned it wouldn't be curly enough because, when I unplugged it, I wasn't sure that the last ones I put in my hair were hot enough.  It was able to touch the rollers enough to roll my hair in them however.  I think next time I might unplug it a few minutes, then plug it back in until finished rolling.  I have very long hair and had to wrap the ends around first until I could roll up from a straight arm to my head and clip.  The clips work well! Hair turned out very curly from the shoulders down, but enough volume above that point to make it look nice.  Didn't last long, but with use a mousse next time, or just washed and almost dry hair.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023

title: Curls great
content: What I don't like about this product?  It is not feasible for women with thick, coarse hair; especially black women.  I have thick, coarse hair so to achieve a good silky curl, I had to straighten my hair (includes blow drying AND using my Chi iron) then roll. That is a lot of heat for one setting. Also, with my hair being so thick, I had to roll in sections because there are not enough rollers to roll my entire head in one sitting. Once the rollers cooled, I removed them & put them back to heat again (another 10-20 minutes) before I could start the next section. This is time consuming to achieve curls. It would be better if there was a larger unit with more rollers to accommodate those with thick, long hair.  This way we could roll our entire head in one sitting.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: The instructions say NOTHING about how to clip the color coded wire roller pins. *TIP:  DO NOT attach the wire roller pin with the longer side facing your scalp because the heat from the roller heats the wire pin and WILL burn your scalp. Yep, I burned my scalp!! Thanks for including clear instructions; NOT.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2024
